meanings.sent1: She always overcleans her room until it sparkles.
meanings.sent2: I need to stop overcleaning the kitchen and relax a bit.
meanings.sent3: After overcleaning the house, she realized she had scrubbed away all the dirt and fun.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with overcleaning turned her into a human vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent5: The image of her overcleaning the same spot for hours was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning too frequently or thoroughly.
meanings.sent1: Her overcleaning of the bathroom annoyed her family.
meanings.sent2: Overcleaning can sometimes lead to unnecessary stress and exhaustion.
meanings.sent3: The overcleaning of the school hallways became a running joke among the students.
meanings.sent4: The overcleaning of his car made it shine brighter than a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The overcleaning of the office was so extreme that even the dust bunnies were scared away.
